section.heading: Presumption as to disability or death from heart disease, hypertension, or respiratory disease.

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-311 added this section.

Applicability of D.C. Law 15-194: § 656 of D.C. Law 15-194, as added by § 2 of D.C. Law 19-311 provided that the the addition of this section by § 652 of D.C. Law 15-194, as added by § 2 of D.C. Law 19-311 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.

Section 3052(d) of Law 21-160 amended section 656 of D.C. Law 19-311, retaining the applicability restriction affecting this section, therefore the creation of this section by § 2 of D.C. Law 19-311 has not been implemented.
